sentence: Trump made a late game endorsement on Saturday of state Sen. Doug Mastriano, the polling front-runner.
title: Trump's GOP clout on the line in high profile Republican primaries in Pennsylvania, North Carolina, Idaho

sentence: The most important and frightening outcome is the decision of Pennsylvanias Republicans by a big margin to make extremist state Sen. Doug Mastriano their partys nominee for governor.
author: E.J. Dionne Jr.
title: Opinion Tuesday primaries show that Trumpism has metastasized

sentence: Right-wing Candidates and the 'Big Lie' Right-wing Republican candidates have performed well in Tuesday's elections, in particular Pennsylvania state Senator Doug Mastriano who will now be the party's nominee for governor.
author: Darragh Roche
title: Five Key Takeaways From Primary Election Results

sentence: In the gubernatorial primary, the Trump-backed far-right candidate Doug Mastriano was able to drub his opponents and win 44% of the vote in a 3-way race, even in the face of staunch opposition from the Republican establishment.
author: Douglas Schoen
title: Schoen: It's still Donald Trump's Republican party
